summary: For both CBBE and CBBE-CT77 users.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Description
[/size]
This mod contains two presets (Nude and Clothed) to look almost exactly like Tsunade. You'll need to have the BodySlide from Caliente to use them.
I used '' Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by [b]ChronoTrigger77 '' [/b]for my armors.
The most lore friendly to the manga are the mage robes. You can choose the HDT(CT77) .xml files if you have the previously mentionned mod.

[size=5]Installation
[/size]
1. Install CBBE and Download the BodySlide from Caliente if you don't already have these.
2. Drop my two .xml files in SliderPresets ----- path: (Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets)
3. Use the two presets like any other one. (see Caliente's tutorial)

[size=5]Informations[/size]

1. English is not my native language but I can read your comments without trouble.
2. The negative and useless comments are not needed.
3. It is the first mod about Tsunade on the Nexus.
4. The download section contains two zip files, in each of them you'll find the two .xml

[size=5]Permissions
[/size]
These files are for everyone and for any purposes. Just remember my name.

[size=5]

The Mods I used
[/size][size=1]   [Stakado]                                          (ENB)                        - Stakado Cinemascope ENB - Near to zero performance loss
      [[b]Apachii]                                         [/b] (Hair)                                                                                      - ApachiiSkyHair
   [Caliente]                                       (BODY)                                                - Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-
    [[b]ChronoTrigger77]                        [/b](Armors)                                              - Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT    [[b]AnTiWoMaAgNoT[/b]]                          (SKIN)                 -  CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096[/size][/center]
author: TheNotSoLongName
